fields.value: Can a Low-Carbon-Energy Transition Be Sustained in Post-Fukushima Japan? Assessing the Varying Impacts of Exogenous Shocks

dsDescriptionValue.value: Monthly data on energy consumption in Japan, in megawatt-hours (MWh) from January 2008 to December 2012. Includes energy consumption for the nation as a whole as well as subsets for the TEPCO energy system, KEPCO energy system, large users, and households. Data also include average monthly temperature in Celsius, squared temperature, and an indicator variable for the March 11, 2011 Fukushima Dai-ichi nuclear disaster.

files.description: Codebook describing the contents of the other files. Includes a description of every variable in the dataset, as well as sources for energy and temperature data.
files.label: codebookJapanEnergy.txt

dataFile.description: Codebook describing the contents of the other files. Includes a description of every variable in the dataset, as well as sources for energy and temperature data.

files.description: A Stata-formatted file including five time series of energy consumption in Japan from January 2008 to December 2012. Also includes an indicator for the Fukushima disaster, temperature in Celsius, and squared temperature. Data on energy consumption were drawn from the Agency for Natural Resources and Energy (http://www.enecho.meti.go.jp/info/statistics/denryoku/result-2.htm). Data on temperature were drawn from the Japan Meterological Agency (http://www.data.jma.go.jp/obd/stats/etrn/index.php).
files.label: comprehensiveJapanEnergy.tab

dataFile.description: A Stata-formatted file including five time series of energy consumption in Japan from January 2008 to December 2012. Also includes an indicator for the Fukushima disaster, temperature in Celsius, and squared temperature. Data on energy consumption were drawn from the Agency for Natural Resources and Energy (http://www.enecho.meti.go.jp/info/statistics/denryoku/result-2.htm). Data on temperature were drawn from the Japan Meterological Agency (http://www.data.jma.go.jp/obd/stats/etrn/index.php).

files.description: An R script that reads the data file, estimates every model reported in the paper, and produces several interpretive figures. The file also computes a variety of regression diagnostics, such as Ljung-Box Q-tests for autocorrelation.
files.label: replicationJapanEnergy.R

dataFile.description: An R script that reads the data file, estimates every model reported in the paper, and produces several interpretive figures. The file also computes a variety of regression diagnostics, such as Ljung-Box Q-tests for autocorrelation.
